attributes.additional_details: Moray should have it's own set of Postcodes away from the IV postcodes of the Highlands, our new postcodes should not be considered as "Remote" We have a better road and rail network and live between two airports so to be considered remote is back in the dark ages. Area just 20 miles along the road in the AB postcode area can enjoy freepost where as Moray is always hit with higher charges.
